alert.note: Alert for DeSoto (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 08 at 10:13AM EDT until further notice by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Cypress Creek At SR 54 Worthington Gardens affecting Pasco County. Horse Creek near Arcadia at SR 72 affecting DeSoto County. .Heavy rainfall has caused water levels on Horse Creek near Arcadia and Cypress Creek at SR 54 Worthington Gardens to rise. For the Cypress Creek at SR 54 Worthington Gardens...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Horse Creek near Arcadia at SR 72...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Horse Creek near Arcadia at SR 72. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Buildings in Hidden Acres flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM EDT Wednesday was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 14.3 feet this morning. It will then fall early tomorrow afternoon. It will rise to 13.6 feet early Saturday morning. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 14.3 feet on 07/23/1968. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (8 am EDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Mon Tue Horse Creek Arcadia at SR 7 12.0 13.3 Wed 8 pm 13.6 13.6 13.4 13.1 12.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 1100 PM EDT.
